mapper.select: select c.c_id c_id,c.c_brand c_brand,c.c_model c_model,c.c_price c_price, co.order_creation_time order_creation_time, co.cellphone_order_id cellphone_order_id,co.order_user_id order_user_id, ra.detailed_address detailed_address,ra.address_id address_id, otc.orderitem_amount orderitem_amount, otc.orderitem_id orderitem_id,otc.orderitem_cellphone_id orderitem_cellphone_id from cellphone_order co inner join receiving_address ra on co.oreder_address_id=ra.address_id inner join ordetitem_cellphone otc on co.cellphone_order_id=otc.orderitem_id inner join cellphone c on otc.orderitem_cellphone_id=c.c_id where co.order_user_id=#{userId} and co.cellphone_order_id=#{id}
select cellphone_order_id id,order_creation_time createtime,order_user_id from cellphone_order userId where order_user_id=#{userId} order by cellphone_order_id asc
